EmailTemplate.name: User Groups.April 2015 Singapore UG
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring User Group - Thursday, April 9 - 7:00pm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Spring User Group Join the Singapore Spring User Group for our Pivotal Open Source night! We will be talking about Hadoop and Spring Cloud.
Our meetup will happen on Thursday, April 9th, 2015. It is a free event organised by Pivotal. It will kindly be hosted by Paypal in Millenia Tower. As usual, it will be a great opportunity to meet some fellow passionate developers and learn about new topics.
You can register on our meetup group here: http://www.meetup.com/singasug/
We look forward to having you join us! Singapore Thursday, April 9 7:00pm-9:00pm (Singapore, Singapore) Register <http://www.meetup.com/singasug/>
